name: Bizzybee Rubber Gloves Medium
description: Proudly supporting Make A Wish® United Kingdom

Bizzybee is proud to be supporting Make A Wish Foundation® UK. As a result of this partnership, bizzybee will donate £10,000 to Make A Wish. This money will help Make A Wish grant more magical wishes to children and young people living with life threatening conditions.
For more information visit: www.make a wish.org.uk
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Preparation_and_Usage>Using your gloves regularly will help to protect your hands and nails from the harmful effects of hot water and detergents.To keep your gloves in great shape, rinse and dab them dry after use.For domestic use only.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
